"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559b49a16368721b26001cee#post_559b49a16368721b26001cee
Kenshiro can go intangible, that means nothing can touch him. Nothing.
He even can "teleport" to other points.
One single punch of Kenshrio, and you are dead. It cannot be a punch, he could you just one finger and turn you into a bloody mess.
How you will stop someone that you can't touch and can kill you with a single finger?
